ValidatableElement Class

Extends ChildBroadcaster
Defined in: app/mixins/validatable-element.js:1

A mixin to be used in every child of ValidationListener that should be validated

  • Index
  • Methods
  • Properties

  • params
)
public

Properties

broadcaster

Object

Inherited from ChildBroadcaster: app/mixins/child-broadcaster.js:36

An read only abstraction of this class only with the methods we would like to provide to our ParentListener

Array

Inherited from ChildBroadcaster: app/mixins/child-broadcaster.js:64
